remarks: A function ` F ` generated by varying the first argument of an inner product (with its second argument a fixed vector ` A ` ) is a bounded linear functional, i.e. a bounded linear operator from the vector space to ` CC ` .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
